custom-action.name: processkiller
custom-action.description:
Run a Choas Monkey engineering scenario defined in Gremlin.
Possible parameters are: - GremlinToken (required): Gremlin API Token Default value is "Gremlin API Token". - GremlinTeamID (required): Gremlin Team ID Default value is "Gremlin Team ID". - GremlinTargetType (required): Type of target : hosts or containers Default value is "Type of target : hosts or containers". - GremlinTargetHostTags (required): List of tags seperated by a , Default value is "List of tags to select the host that will be target by the attack". - GremlinTarget (required): Select the target by Percent or exact Default value is "percent or exact". - GremlinTargetNumber (required): Number of targets that would be impacted ( in percentage or exact depends on the value the parameter GremlinTarget Default value is "Number of targets that would be impacted ". An attack which kills the specified process https://www.gremlin.com/docs/infrastructure-layer/attacks/processkiller
Possible parameters are: - Length (optional): The length of the attack (seconds) Value must be of type: Integer Default value is "60". - Interval (optional): The number of seconds to delay before kills Value must be of type: Integer Default value is "1". - Process (required): The process name to match (allows regex) or the process ID Value must be of type: String - Group (optional): The group name or ID to match against (name matches only) Value must be of type: String - User (optional): The user name or ID to match against (name matches only) Value must be of type: String

custom-action-parameter.name: GremlinTargetType
custom-action-parameter.value: Type of target : hosts or containers

custom-action-parameter.value: List of tags to select the host that will be target by the attack

custom-action-parameter.value: Number of targets that would be impacted
